name: Shadowrun Collection
description:
Shadowrun Collection is the collection containing the three games of this franchise.

• Shadowrun Returns
• Shadowrun: Dragonfall - Director's Cut
• Shadowrun: Hong Kong - Extended Edition

The games takes place in the setting of the Shadowrun tabletop role-playing game. Which is a science fantasy tabletop role-playing game set in a near-future fictional universe in which cybernetics, magic and fantasy creatures co-exist. It combines genres of cyberpunk, urban fantasy and crime, with occasional elements of conspiracy, horror and detective fiction.
